item.title: Tiffany add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by William Shakespeare
Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Todd Strasser
item.description: "The story you are about to read is a work of fiction. Nothing - and everything - about it is real." -- Todd Strasser

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Beverly Cleary
item.description: "Quite often somebody will say, 'What year do your books take place?' and the only answer I can give is, in childhood." -- Beverly Cleary

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "People aren't either wicked or noble. They're like chef's salads, with good things and bad things chopped and mixed together in a vinaigrette of confusion and conflict." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "No matter who you are, no matter where you live, and no matter how many people are chasing you, what you don't read is often as important as what you do read." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Fate is like a strange, unpopular restaurant filled with odd little waiters who bring you things you never asked for and don't always like." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
